Parameter.Label: Basic Set Level
Parameter.Help:
Set basic set value to be on or off.
0=Disable
1-99=Use Value

Parameter.Label: Temperature Trigger ON value
Parameter.Help: Temperature level when a ON command is sent out. Set to 99 to disable.

Parameter.Label: Temperature Trigger OFF value
Parameter.Help: Temperature level when a OFF command is sent out. Set to 99 to disable.

Parameter.Label: Humidity Trigger ON value
Parameter.Help:
Humidity level when a ON command is sent out. Set to 99 to disable.
Interval in seconds.

Parameter.Label: Humidity Trigger OFF value
Parameter.Help:
Humidity level when a OFF command is sent out. Set to 99 to disable.
Interval in seconds.

Parameter.Label: Auto report time
Parameter.Help:
Sets the time interval when a sensor report is sent.
0 = Disable
1 min - 1439 min = Auto report periodically

Parameter.Label: Auto report temperature
Parameter.Help:
Sets the temperature change causing a sensor report.
0 = Disable
1 - 70 = Auto report on temperature change

Parameter.Label: Auto report humidity
Parameter.Help:
Sets the humidity change causing a sensor report.
0 = Disable
5 - 70 = Auto report on humidity change
